text: illeogalodoe baegseongdeul-iyeo sillo neohui moduege haneulgwa ttang-eul daseulineun hananimkkeseo naleul seonjijalo bonaesyeossnola geubun oeeneun eotteon sindo eobs-eumyeo saengmyeong-eul jusimyeo as-a ganeun bundo geubun-isila geuleohamae hananim-eul midgo geubun-ui muhagja seon jijaleul mid-eula geuneun hananim-eul mid go geubun-ui malsseum-eul mid-euni geuleul tta leula geulihamyeon neohuiga indodoelila
